name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shoto Todoroki: Between Fire and Ice My Hero Academia Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shoto Todoroki: Between Fire and Ice My Hero Academia live wallpaper with a clock and Google search bar for your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features
Live Wallpaper: Showcasing Todoroki’s unique fire and ice abilities.
Built-in Clock: Easy-to-read time display.
Google Search Bar: Instant access to search from your tab.
Optimized Performance: Smooth and lightweight for quick browsing.
Perfect for Fans: A tribute to Todoroki’s power and resilience.
